title: brown~
description: `brown~` generates brown noise, also known as Brownian or red noise, characterized by a 6dB/octave spectral rolloff, making it less hissy than white noise. It operates as a bounded random walk within -1 and 1, with a configurable maximum step size that influences its spectral characteristics. The object also supports seeding for reproducible noise sequences and can generate new random steps via signal input.
